alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 2:50PM CDT until May 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Guadalupe River Near Cuero affecting DeWitt County. Sandies Creek Near Westhoff affecting DeWitt County. San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Goliad and Karnes Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Flooding spreads across the wide flood plain upstream and downstream. No structures are threatened. Livestock and farm equipment will need to removed from the floodplain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 29.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM CDT Saturday was 29.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to rise until cresting at 36.5 feet by early tomorrow afternoon. It will then slowly fall until dropping below flood stage by Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 36.4 feet on 06/05/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 29.8 Sat 2 pm CDT 36.5 31.0 27.4 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM CDT.
